message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm not willing to go above $100.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $80 is too low, I'm willing to negotiate. How about $140?
I'm still interested in the product, but $140 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $120?
